name: Find neighbors
description: Find the closest cluster rows to a given one

inputs.name: cluster-id
inputs.description: The cluster to select rows from

inputs.name: n
inputs.description: The number of points to return

inputs.name: instance
inputs.description: Base row to compute distances, as a map from field identifiers to values

outputs.name: rows
outputs.description: The list of the n closest rows to `base`
